overview:
Intelligentcomms provides an accurate and independent telecoms contract lifecycle management service that can radically improve the management of your landline, mobile and WAN communications and save your organisation up to 30% of your annual telecoms costs.

We input full details of all your landline, mobile and WAN communications to our secure, web-based management register called Veropath. At the end of each month, we then enter full billing details into the system allowing interrogation against services provided using Veropathâ€™s user friendly and intuitive web interface. This gives complete clarity and transparency of telecoms provision and costs.

In particular it gives you the tools to monitor, measure and manage all aspects of service provision, giving you:

  1. Internal reporting and billing that is both transparent and accurate;
  2. Budgeting and forecasting at an extremely precise level;
  3. Forecast savings validated against actuals achieved on a monthly basis;
  4. Trend and impact analysis, including exception reporting;
  5. The ability to analyse telecoms usage to highlight billing errors and discrepancies, misuse of facilities, incorrect assignment of costs, and unnecessary expenditure;
  6. Effective contract lifecycle management.

Veropath is our own market leading software platform enabling a level of accuracy and control over telecoms costs and services not previously possible. It has been specifically designed to:

  1. Analyse network provider data at a transactional level;
  2. Monitor multiple network provider billing platforms at the same time;
  3. Bring clarity to data received from your network providers;
  4. Take telecoms expense management to a new level;
  5. Dramatically improve information sharing within the business;
  6. Feed in constantly updated market knowledge against which to compare your telecoms provision.
